mapper.select: select id,evaluateUserName,evaluatedUserName,score,className,createTime,type,content from ( select a.id , (select real_name from sys_user where id=evaluate_user_id limit 1)as evaluateUserName, (select real_name from sys_user where id=evaluated_user_id limit 1)as evaluatedUserName, score , c.name as className , a.create_time as createTime , a.type as type , a.content as content from teach_evaluate a join teach_class c on a.class_id = c.id where a.deleted = 0)t where 1=1 and t.evaluateUserName like concat('%',#{query.evaluateUserName},'%') and t.evaluatedUserName like concat('%',#{query.evaluatedUserName},'%') and t.className like concat('%',#{query.className},'%') and t.type = #{query.type}
